name: react-plotly.js
description: A plotly.js react component from Plotly
author: Plotly, Inc.

scripts.make:lib: mkdirp lib && babel src --out-dir=lib --ignore __tests__/*.js,__mocks__/*.js --presets=es2015,react --source-maps --plugins babel-plugin-add-module-exports && mv lib/* ./ && rmdir lib
scripts.make:dist: mkdirp dist && browserify src/factory.js -o ./dist/create-plotly-component.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins add-module-exports ] -t browserify-global-shim --standalone createPlotlyComponent && uglifyjs ./dist/create-plotly-component.js --compress --mangle --output ./dist/create-plotly-component.min.js --source-map filename=dist/create-plotly-component.min.js.map
scripts.clean: rimraf lib dist react-plotly.js react-plotly.js.map factory.js factory.js.map
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run make:lib && npm run make:dist
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run deps && jest
